Verify the 'Price' column header has text boldness 700, font size 14px, text color #343a40, padding 10px vertical 8px horizontal, content alignment right, top position 0, and remains sticky during vertical scroll for 500px
Add an item to the shopping cart

Verify the cart badge shows item count '1' with background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, text boldness 600, width 18px, height 18px, corner curvature 50%, and position top 2px right 2px relative to the cart icon
Click the second carousel dot indicator

Verify the second carousel dot indicator becomes active/selected, changing its background color from #cccccc to #007bff over 250ms, width increases from 8px to 16px, height remains 8px, corner curvature 4px, and x-coordinate is 80px
Interact with the file upload component
Verify the file upload component has label text 'Attach File', placeholder text 'Browse...', width 320px, border 1px dashed #ced4da, is enabled, and text color for the chosen file name is #495057
Start an image upload
Verify the progress bar container is displayed with background color #e9ecef
Confirm the filled bar has width 50% of the container, background color #007bff, height 8px, and corner curvature 4px when the upload reaches 50%
Open the calendar component
Verify the current date '2023-10-27' has background color #007bff and font color #ffffff
Ensure the calendar's overall width is 260px, height 280px, border 1px solid #dee2e6, and padding 15px on all sides
Hover over the 'Info' icon (x: 100, y: 50)

Verify the tooltip appears within 200ms, displaying text 'Additional information here', has background color #343a40, text color #ffffff, font size 13px, corner curvature 3px, opacity 0.95, y-coordinate 65px, and x-coordinate 100px
Locate the 'Terms of Service' link in the footer

Verify the 'Terms of Service' link has text color #6c757d, font size 14px, text boldness 400, right margin 10px, bottom padding 8px, href attribute 'https://example.com/terms', and aria-label 'Read our Terms of Service'
